name: Informative Coding
description: Informative Coding is a non-profit organization that helps to learn technology in Bangla. The purpose of which is to motivate people to learn technology by simply introducing them to technology.

name: Dr. Omar Danoun's Blog Website
description: A comprehensive project featuring a robust backend built with Express.js, Node.js, and Mongoose, a modern front-end using React.js and TailwindCSS, and a versatile admin panel for managing content and users. This solution ensures a seamless experience for both site visitors and administrators.

name: Laptop Optimize (E-Commerce Website)
description: Laptop optimize is an eCommerce website developed by MERN stack technologies.

description: This is an admin panel for managing the 'Laptop optimize' website that is developed by MERN stack technologies. Login credentials - email: admin@admin.com password: admin

name: Portfolio Website
description: This is a simple portfolio website developed with ReactJs and NextJs and many more technologies have been used to develop this website. Thank you

name: School Management System (Website)
description: I've made School Management System (Website, Admin Panel, and Teacher Panel). This is a large project built by NodeJs and Ejs, as the database, I've used MongoDB and mongoose library. I spent a lot of time building this project, where I've created design templates and implemented them in coding. Full documentation and visualization of this project are coming soon. Thanks & regards!

name: Dr. Omar Danoun's Online Appointment Scheduler
description: A streamlined appointment booking platform designed for Dr. Omar Danoun. It features a user-friendly interface and integrates with Calendly for easy scheduling, ensuring efficient management of appointments and a seamless user experience.

name: Lavossy Pvt Ltd Gift Claim Website
description: A dedicated gift claim platform for X Private Limited Company, integrated with their shopping site to allow customers to claim gift products. The system includes a web interface for users, an admin panel for order management, and a serverless backend for efficient processing and Amazon MFC integration.

name: Ellty Company Task List Application
description: A pixel-perfect task list application for Ellty Company, focusing on a highly detailed UI/UX design. The application allows users to mark tasks as completed and finalize them with a 'Done' button, featuring custom checkboxes designed meticulously in Figma.
